subject: Re:
preview: Hi Ali,   Yes sure, confirming I have added an Account from Nick. He should receive his logins shortly.

full_threads.body:
Hi Ali,

Yes sure, confirming I have added an Account from Nick. He should receive his logins shortly.

Hello, Sales Force has requested for wordpress website log in information to install the CRM plugin for gravity cloud. May have the info asap please, they are waiting.

Kind Regards,

Ali Bogethe rug experts
1300 166 266
Mobile: 0414 852 263
Tel: (02) 9558 2288
Email: ali@therugexperts.com.au
Web: http://www.therugexperts.com.au/21-23 Homer Street, Earlwood NSW 2206

@heath Hi Heath, I need your help. I think the client needs to be called.

info@ is not receiving the emails I think there is an issue with it. I tried changing “from email” still not working. Im not sure if you have contact with the IT.

Also he wants to integrate the forms to salesforce I think a plugin can do this or through zapier.

Hello , I just need to confirm if you already have the plugin or if it needs to be purchased.

https://www.crmperks.com/plugins/gravity-forms-plugins/gravity-forms-salesforce-plugin/

Kind Regards,
